text: Independence Day is an American science fiction action movie about two men trying to stop aliens from taking over the world. It stars Jeff Goldblum, Bill Pullman and Will Smith. It was followed by Independence Day: Resurgence, which was released on June 24, 2016. ==References== ==Other websites== * Independence Day at 20th Century Fox * * * * Category:1996 action movies Category:1990s disaster movies Category:1996 science fiction movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:1990s American action movies Category:1990s American disaster movies Category:American science fiction movies Category:1990s English-language movies Category:Movies set in the 1990s Category:Movies about extraterrestrial life Category:Movies set in California Category:Movies set in Egypt Category:Movies set in Japan Category:Movies set in Houston Category:Movies set in Iraq Category:Movies set in Los Angeles Category:Movies set in Nevada Category:Movies set in New York City Category:Movies set in Washington, D.C. Category:Movies directed by Roland Emmerich
title: Independence Day (1996 movie)
